title: Optimizing Transit in San Diego: My Map, My Mistakes
summary: I mapped transit deserts, fought GTFS quirks, and learned why context matters more than color in visualization.

title: FashionMNIST: Building a Model Comparison Dashboard
summary: Why I built a Streamlit dashboard to compare MLP vs. CNN on FashionMNIST, what broke along the way, and how I made evaluation actually useful.
